name: INS-014: Change border style of heading element and verify the border style value

steps.name: Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Wait for the page listing to be loaded
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create from template']
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create blank page']
Create a new PAGE page from template
Click on the element By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create from template']
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create from template']

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create from template']

steps.name: Click on the element By.id: page-template

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: page-template

steps.name: Verify page title is Select page template

attachments.name: ==> The Text is: Select page template

steps.name: Wait for the page to be loaded
Switch to Frame by Name: pf-sandbox
Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Drag and drop Heading element to the editor
Click on the element By.id: catalog--catalog-list--heading

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: catalog--catalog-list--heading

steps.name: Drag from element By.className: Catalog-Image to element By.cssSelector: iframe
Change border style and verify selected element has the correct border style
Get attribute aria-selected of element By.id: styling
Verify selected element has id 6f141b9b-b5cf-4d76-94a3-ea17c6f33e45 has css attribute border-style with value solid
Switch to Frame by Name: pf-sandbox
Verify element By.xpath: //*[@data-pf-id='6f141b9b-b5cf-4d76-94a3-ea17c6f33e45'] with attribute border-style has value is solid
Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Change border style and verify selected element has the correct border style
Get attribute aria-selected of element By.id: styling
Verify selected element has id 6f141b9b-b5cf-4d76-94a3-ea17c6f33e45 has css attribute border-style with value none
Switch to Frame by Name: pf-sandbox
Verify element By.xpath: //*[@data-pf-id='6f141b9b-b5cf-4d76-94a3-ea17c6f33e45'] with attribute border-style has value is none
Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Change border style and verify selected element has the correct border style
Get attribute aria-selected of element By.id: styling
Verify selected element has id 6f141b9b-b5cf-4d76-94a3-ea17c6f33e45 has css attribute border-style with value dotted
Switch to Frame by Name: pf-sandbox
Verify element By.xpath: //*[@data-pf-id='6f141b9b-b5cf-4d76-94a3-ea17c6f33e45'] with attribute border-style has value is dotted
Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Change border style and verify selected element has the correct border style
Get attribute aria-selected of element By.id: styling
Verify selected element has id 6f141b9b-b5cf-4d76-94a3-ea17c6f33e45 has css attribute border-style with value dashed
Switch to Frame by Name: pf-sandbox
Verify element By.xpath: //*[@data-pf-id='6f141b9b-b5cf-4d76-94a3-ea17c6f33e45'] with attribute border-style has value is dashed
Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Toggle off border style and verify selected element has removed border style attribute
Get attribute aria-selected of element By.id: styling
Verify selected element has id 6f141b9b-b5cf-4d76-94a3-ea17c6f33e45 has removed css attribute border-style
Switch to Frame by Name: pf-sandbox
Verify element By.xpath: //*[@data-pf-id='6f141b9b-b5cf-4d76-94a3-ea17c6f33e45'] not have attribute border-style with value dashed
Get CSS value border-style of element By.xpath: //*[@data-pf-id='6f141b9b-b5cf-4d76-94a3-ea17c6f33e45']
Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
